Integration Test Example Container

This example will describe how to do an integration-test with a web application which will be deployed to a servlet container like Tomcat.

We use the CARGO to do the integration test of a web application.

By the help of Cargo it's possible to do the startup of a container, deploy the web application (war) start the container and run the integration tests and finally stop the container.

Cargo supports a large number of containers which can be used either via the Java API or in our case via the Maven 2/3 Plugin.
